entries.title: Project resumed
entries.summary: StreamSuites dashboard resumes active monitoring with live runtime snapshots and Rumble marked paused.
details: Removed suspension banners and reinstated active language across public and admin surfaces.
Dashboard now polls runtime snapshots for platform status, heartbeat timestamps, and paused reasons.
Rumble remains paused with red status indicators while YouTube and Twitch monitoring stay active.

entries.title: Project suspended
entries.summary: Historical suspension notice preserved for reference after resumption.
details: Documented the temporary suspension triggered by unstable Rumble chat ingestion.
Recorded mitigation attempts and export shapes used during the pause.
Superseded by the May 2025 resumption; monitoring now continues with Rumble paused.

entries.title: Public surface refresh
entries.summary: Public static shells gain roadmap parity, glass treatments, and consistent badges.
details: Delivered static public pages for support, tools, about, privacy, changelog, and accessibility.
Mirrored dashboard roadmap snapshots with expandable rows and legend overlays on public pages.
Aligned CTA sweeps, dotted grids, and badge rendering across public shells for consistency.

entries.title: Read-only runtime scaffolding
entries.summary: Ensured static rendering paths stay deterministic and versioned for public previews.
details: Swapped roadmap progress bars to native <progress> elements for deterministic, accessible rendering.
Stabilized version badge rendering across public shells to match dashboard runtime conventions.
Kept gradient sweeps and glass treatments runtime-safe for GitHub Pages delivery.

entries.title: Dashboard roadmap foundations
entries.summary: Documented roadmap intent and aligned progress displays with dashboard styling.
details: Published initial public previews for clips, polls, tallies, and scoreboards.
Documented automation hooks, chat triggers, and upload planning for roadmap visibility.
